sentences.chinese: 歷術甲子篇太初元年，歲名「焉逢攝提格」，月名「畢聚」，日得甲子，夜半朔旦冬至。
sentences.literal: Calendar method Jiazi chapter Tai Chu first year, year named "Yanfeng Shetige", month named "Biju", day got Jiazi, midnight new moon dawn winter solstice.

sentences.chinese: 正北十二無大餘，無小餘；
sentences.literal: North twelve no large remainder, no small remainder;
No large remainder, no small remainder;
Yanfeng Shetige Tai Chu first year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘五十四，小餘三百四十八；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder fifty four, small remainder three hundred forty eight;
Large remainder five, small remainder eight;

sentences.chinese: 閏十三大餘四十八，小餘六百九十六；
sentences.literal: Intercalary thirteen large remainder forty eight, small remainder six hundred ninety six;
Large remainder ten, small remainder sixteen;
You Zhao Zhi Xu third year.

sentences.chinese: 十二大餘十二，小餘六百三；
sentences.literal: Twelve large remainder twelve, small remainder six hundred three;
Large remainder fifteen, small remainder twenty four;
Qiang Wu Da Huang Luo fourth year.
Twelve large remainder seven, small remainder eleven;
Large remainder twenty one, no small remainder;
